data.event: As of the 2010 census, the population was 971,777, and a 2014 estimate put the population at 1,030,447.
As one of the most affluent counties in the United States, it also has the highest percentage (29.2%) of residents over 25 years of age who hold post-graduate degrees.
In 2011, it was ranked by Forbes as the 10th richest in the United States, with a median household income of $92,213.
